goal.ch:
本課程幫助學生 
1. 習得正式英語。 
2. 表達觀點、訓練口說應對技巧、學習與他人共同解決問題。 
3. 模擬商務情境，如會議、社交、電話、協商、簡報、面試等。 
4. 瞭解及分析不同文化的差異，擴大同理心。 
5. 培養英語聽力的習慣及自信心。 
6. 加強學生商用英語字/詞彙、片語、表達法及句型的建構。
goal.en: This course is the first in a series of two, structured to help learners improve their business communication skills with a focus on three aspects of the English language: speaking techniques, listening competence, and vocabulary power, in order of priority. Through choice Task-Based Learning (TBL) materials, students can learn to communicate real meaning in natural context, which offers them opportunities to further develop their background knowledge, critical thinking skills, managerial capability, in addition to the focused language acquisition. Upon completion of the course, students will be able to communicate more diplomatically, thereby more skillfully and effectively, demonstrating functional language in everyday business scenarios towards problem-solving ability.
